doc.title: Filmstrip
doc.plot: Filmstrip is an educational filmstrip for young adults about the perils and absurdities of modern relationships. Using the imagery and format of filmstrips from elementary schools in the 1960s and 1970s, Filmstrip tackles very contemporary issues: infidelity, open relationships, California, Burning Man: all those things you wish you had been taught in school! Filmstrip is a digital update of a familiar form that combines found footage with original artwork and dialogue.
